name: Toy Market
description: This is a Disney Toys Website.
technologies: React.js, React Router,Tailwind CSS,Daisy UI, NodeJs , ExpressJs , Firebase Authentication,MongoDB
features: have a Toys list.Users can view the toys gallery , All Toys, My Toys,Users can See how to buy.Users can add toys, have an extra section which has customer comments , if user is signed in then he visit the website.have blog page

name: JobHolder
technologies: React.js, React Router, Tailwind, CSS, AreaChart
features: have a job category list, job features.users can view details.users can apply for jobs.Users can visit statistics, blogs, and applied job pages. I have used js, react-router.For designing, I have used Tailwind css.

name: EduLine
description: This is a foreign language club website.
features: have classes section.have instructors section.the user can view any instructor information, student info. -user can view dashboard , class info. have an extra section which you can see why you study with us. if user is signed in then he visit the website.
